General.Name: Guandian Defense Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Guandian Defense Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) systems and intelligent defense equipment for anti-drug applications in China. It also offers UAV flight and data processing services. The company was formerly known as Beijing Guandian Aviation Technology Co., Ltd. Guandian Defense Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhenbing  Li
1.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. & Board Sec.
